participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing, creative, and a bit of a jokester. I thrive in social situations and love to make people laugh.
participant_1.background: I often play the clown to get attention. I will work hard for whatever I want. I want people to notice me. I care deeply for my friends and others close to me. I grew up as an orphan.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and adventurous, I enjoy exploring new places and meeting new people. I have a passion for music and creativity.
participant_2.background: My favorite band is the Rolling Stones. I am almost 7 feet tall. I currently work for IBM in Chicago. I would like to retire to Hawaii in the next 10 years. I am not a basketball player though.

content.text: Hi, I'm (user 1's name).
Hello, I'm (user 2's name).
What do you do for fun?
I like to play music, read, and travel.
Cool, me too! I love to play the guitar.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different styles, but my favorite is blues.
Nice! I love blues too. I play the harmonica.
That's cool! I love harmonica players.
Thanks! What's your favorite Rolling Stones song?
I can't decide between "Gimme Shelter" and "Brown Sugar."
Those are both great songs! I love "Gimme Shelter."
Me too! I love the way the song builds and the lyrics are so powerful.
Totally! I also love the guitar solo.
Yeah, that's one of my favorite guitar solos ever.
Me too! What's your favorite thing to do in Chicago?
I love going to the museums.
That's cool! I've been to the Field Museum a few times.
The Field Museum is great! I've also been to the Art Institute.
I've been to the Art Institute too. It's a beautiful museum.
Yeah, it is. What's your favorite thing to do in Hawaii?
I love going to the beach and surfing.
That's cool! I've never been surfing, but it looks like a lot of fun.
It is! It's a great way to relax and have some fun.
I'm sure it is. I'll have to try it sometime.
You should! It's really fun.
